channel.title: Magic Book spells tele. [HELP] PLZZ
channel.description: Hi i creating my new server called Lovleyscape so yea i know how to code a lil bit , but i need a better coder plzzzzzz , also i want to know how can i change my tele magic book spells teleports, im using a Exion 317 server, the only teleports are KBD ROCKCRABS, ETC. i want them to say like Monsters [ rock crabs, etc,etc] Bosses [ kbd,kq,etc,etc] skills ,minigames [ void game ,etc] i couldn't do it, and i already try. plzzzzz i need help thanks

item.title: Magic Book spells tele. [HELP] PLZZ
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“lovelybones, post:6, topic:405794”]For normal magic

HOME : 1195

ROCKCRABS : 1164 —> I want this to say monsters and when i open it up, to have like MAGIC BOOK-Monsters-(Rck crabs, dagg, etc.

KBD: 1167 —> i want this to say pk tele and have all the pK teleports , MG-Pk teles-(edg,varr,magebank,etc.)

KQueen: 1170 ----> i want this to say Bosses teles , and have KBD,kQueen,dagg bosses and GDW.

Skilling 1540 —> this is ok , this dont need skill menus.

OH AND I DONT KNOW WHERE TO CHANGE THE FILES AND ALL THAT

THIS IS AN EXION SOURCE 317 , please i need HELP ASAP[/quote]
I can’t just give you the code with out referring to the code myself, but what you want will be in model/player/packets. Look for the current teleports and just edit accordingly. With a bit of trial and error you’ll get the hang of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Magic Book spells tele. [HELP] PLZZ
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

lovelybones, check the action button ID printed in the console when you click a button/link in game. This is the case 9159: you’ll use or whatever number you get. They are marked in the file

//First option

//Second option

etc., this is where you’ll initiate the teleport for the corresponding case of that option.

Read full topic

item.title: Magic Book spells tele. [HELP] PLZZ
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Ugh, I can teach you easily but I don’t have a PI to hand, and I don’t feel like downloading one. Basically, click the teleport and take note of the action button.

Make that action button send a 5 option dialogue or whatever.

Then click the first option and take note of the action button of that and make it teleport you to the corresponding text.

Have a play around, that’s all I can say for now.

Also, use what’s already there for reference.

Read full topic
